summary: Rename 'Actual Time' label to 'Best Time' in speed training exercise logging config. Two string changes in a single file.

phases.name: Config Modification
phases.description: Edit the label and placeholder strings in the speed category config

subtasks.description: Edit src/config/exerciseFields/logging/configs.ts: Change line ~77 label from 'Actual Time' to 'Best Time' and line ~80 placeholder from 'e.g., 12.5' to 'e.g., 4.85'
acceptanceCriteria: Label changed from 'Actual Time' to 'Best Time'
No other changes to the file

phases.name: Type Check Verification
phases.description: Verify no type errors introduced by the string changes

subtasks.description: Run npm run typecheck and verify zero errors
acceptanceCriteria: npm run typecheck exits with code 0

phases.name: E2E Verification
phases.description: Verify the label change is visible in the UI when logging a speed exercise

subtasks.description: Browser test: Navigate to workout logger with a speed exercise, snapshot the logging form, assert 'Best Time' label is visible (not 'Actual Time')
acceptanceCriteria: Speed exercise logging form displays 'Best Time' label

risks.mitigation: Typecheck will catch any syntax errors
